posts.postText:
NNJG, what is your eye color?
If it changes according to the seasons, pick the one it is right now.
If choosing other, reply with the specific color.
my eye colour is a greenish-blue :D

Hazel eyes unite;
also, should i note i have a red ring around my pupil?

Boring-ass brown. All I want is two different colored eyes.  Fuck you, probability.

>> Boring-ass brown. All I want is two different colored eyes.  Fuck you, probability. 
Buy two seperate pairs of colored contacts, then swap one color from the case of another. Bam, different colored eyes. (this is assuming you dont want your brown either, otherwise, just get one pair, and only place one contact in)
Apparently heterochromia (two different eye colors) sometimes can happen after trauma or the use of certain eyedrops. BRB, buying every eyedrop I can get my hands on!
